title: FIFA World Cup : Number of goals scored at each tournament 1930 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of goals scored for 21 number of Countriess.
The Number of goals scored is highest at Countries Brazil 2014 and lowest at Countries Italy 1934.
There is a difference of 101.0 between the maximum Countries Brazil 2014 and minimum Countries Italy 1934.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of goals scored for 21 number of Countriess.
The maximum Number of goals scored 171.0 is found at Countries Brazil 2014 and the minimum is found at Italy 1934 where Countries is 70.0.

max_summary: This bar chart has 21 columns on the x axis representing Countries, and Number of goals scored in each Countries on the y axis.
The Number of goals scored is highest at Countries Brazil 2014 and lowest at Countries Italy 1934.
The lowest value at Countries Italy 1934 is 2.44x times less than the highest value at Brazil 2014.
The Countries Brazil 2014 has the highest Number of goals scored, followed by France 1998, and Russia 2018. Down to the Countries Italy 1934 which is the lowest.
Countries Brazil 2014, and France 1998 share the same value 171.0.
The lowest value 70.0 at Italy 1934 is almost 1.41 times smaller than the average value 121.24.
The Number of goals scored is 2546.0 if we add up values of all Countriess.
